abstract: In a deal to be announced on Wednesday and to be carried out later this year, Hulu will have a selection of shows from Univision, the leading Spanish language network in the United States.
snippet: In a deal to be announced on Wednesday and to be carried out later this year, Hulu will have a selection of shows from Univision, the leading Spanish language network in the United States.

headline.print_headline: Hulu to Start Carrying Spanish-Language Shows
